Html:
I have uploaded the C# version in the ~/CSK-CS.zip. Any fixing would be really a great contribution to the project. If you make some changes, reatach the ZIP file into an issue and I will promptly upload it to TFS.

Thanks Everyone!

Zack
woops, I think I might have deleted it, please can you check that it is available.

Still there.

No one has fixed the errors!!!! I can't release the C# version until it at least runs!

Sorry C# guys, we need more time!

I have created a seperate project file within the solution for C# code called "Club Start Kit C"

This way we can all work on the C# version
